name: Estrad Asylum
description:
Estrad Asylum

***Sensitive Content Warning***

Contains representations of:

  •  Torture
  •  Severe Mental Illness
  •  Identity Based Abuse

You take the role of a new mid 1800's asylum worker; tasked with correcting the behavior of a "man" who has been beaten and thrown in an underground asylum after her master's attempt to "get fresh" with her following his wife's weekend trip to the city. Starting as a normal but traumatized girl, you get the pleasure of causing a fellow human being to slowly descend into madness as the mental effects of your torture takes its toll.

Credits:
